name: Ivory Tower (MizunoKetsuban)
description:
Produced for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, with the theme 'Roll of the Dice'.
 
Follow the Dicemancer, as he climbs the endless Ivory Tower and fights off evil Yacht Knights to prove he is the strongest Cubed Sorcerer in all of Calabozo Maestro.

Key Features
• Roll the dice and win big! The bigger the number on your body, the larger your score will become.
• Classic 80s style arcade gameplay!
• Charming pixel art and animation by Ethan, with CD quality arcade style music by RSM!

Controls
Left/Right: Move
A/Space: Jump
X/Delete: Erase Scores
